name: brain oligodendroglioma
definition: A brain glioma that has_material_basis_in oligodendrocytes. [url:http\://www.cancer.gov/dictionary?CdrID=46257]

clinicalTrials.title: A Phase I/II Study of High-dose L-methylfolate in Combination With Temozolomide and Bevacizumab in Recurrent High Grade Glioma
